alert.note: Alert for Story (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 15 at 8:50AM CDT until June 16 at 2:21PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Des Moines IA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa... South Skunk River near Ames W Riverside Rd affecting Story County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Skunk River near Ames W Riverside Rd. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.9 feet, Water affects Westech Engineering... located at 600 Arrasmith Trail. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.4 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 13.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 12.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
